actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to provide a limitation of 2 years on civil actions brought to prevent unlawful unemployment practices.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides, under the Civil Rights Act of 1964, for a limitation of two years on civil actions brought to prevent unlawful unemployment practices. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 2000e-5(f)(i))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to provide a limitation of 2 years on civil actions brought to prevent unlawful unemployment practices.
